author: Spiegel Online
description: Viele Politiker wünschen sich, auf der Höhe der Zeit zu sein. Emmanuel Macron ist einer der wenigen, denen es gelingt. Wie genau, das zeigt die Dokumentation "Macron: Hinter den Kulissen des Sieges"
title: Doku über Emmanuel Macron: Er hat alles neu gemacht

description: Silvio Berlusconi has described Emmanuel Macron as a "good looking lad with a with a good looking mom," in an apparent dig at the age gap between the newly elected French president and his wife Brigitte Trogneux.
title: Silvio Berlusconi says Emmanuel Macron is 'a nice lad - with a good looking mum'

author: Alle Beiträge von ap  anzeigen.
description: Der neue französische Staatspräsident Emmanuel Macron hat sein Kabinett zusammengestellt. Finanzminister wird ein Deutschland-Kenner – Bruno Le Maire trägt das Bundesverdienstkreuz.
title: Emmanuel Macron bestimmt Kabinett: Bruno Le Maire wird Frankreichs Finanzminister

author: Lucy Pasha-Robinson
description: France's newly-elected President Emmanuel Macron has named Édouard Philippe as Prime Minister, according to a statement from the Élysée Palace.  The 46-year-old lawmaker and mayor of Le Havre is from the conservative Les Republicains party. He had been tipped as a favourite for the role as Mr Macron attempts to gain support from both the left and right ahead of June's Parliamentary elections.
title: Emmanuel Macron has named his Prime Minister on his first day in office

author: Malte Fischer
description: Der Chefstratege des Vermögensverwalters Carmignac, Didier Saint-Georges, über die Reformagenda von Emmanuel Macron.
title: Didier Saint-Georges: "Die Akzeptanz für weniger Staat ist gering"

author: Spiegel Online
description: Die französische Regierung nimmt Formen an: Präsident Emmanuel Macron hat seine Minister ernannt. Sie kommen aus den verschiedensten Parteien.
title: Frankreichs neues Kabinett: Außenminister Le Drian, Verteidigungsministerin Goulard

author: Sean McLain
description: The head of the Renault-Nissan Alliance said “we need to defend, explain and market globalization.” He also welcomed the recent election of Emmanuel Macron in France.
title: Carlos Ghosn: Politicians Need to Be Better at Defending Globalization

description: Der französische Präsident Emmanuel Macron hat seine neuen Minister vorgestellt. Das Kabinett ist eine Mischung aus Sozialisten, Liberalen und Konservativen.
title: Regierung in Frankreich: Macrons Minister

author: Ingrid Melander and Emmanuel Jarry
description: A leading French conservative accused President Emmanuel Macron of "dynamiting" the political landscape on Tuesday as he put together a government that is expected to include former rivals on both left and right.
title: France's Macron to name ministers Wednesday as rivals fear 'dynamiting'

author: Ingrid Melander and Michel Rose
description: France's centrist President Emmanuel Macron named his government on Wednesday, appointing a mix of political hues to the top jobs as part of his promise to bridge the right-left divide.
title: France's Macron mixes political shades in ministerial appointments
